nodes.text: The seismic wave emitter was a weapon located on the bow of a Protodeka, and was used to clear enemy vehicles out of its immediate vicinity. The pulse was able to disable deflector shields, leaving the enemy targets vulnerable to the Protodeka's missile launchers and turbolasers.
This weapon was used by the Protodeka, a boss-type vehicle appearing in the video game Star Wars: The Clone Wars.
